Node Manager Library¶

Node Manager¶

class PyISY.Nodes.Nodes(parent, root=None, nids=None, nnames=None, nparents=None, nobjs=None, ntypes=None, xml=None)[source]¶

This class handles the ISY nodes. This class can be used as a dictionary to navigate through the controller’s structure to objects of type Node and Group that represent objects on the controller.

parent: ISY class
root: [optional] String representing the current navigation level’s ID
nids: [optional] list of node ids
nnames: [optional] list of node names
nparents: [optional] list of node parents
nobjs: [optional] list of node objects
ntypes: [optional] list of node types
xml: [optional] String of xml data containing the configuration data
__getitem__(val)[source]¶

Used for navigating through the node tree. Can take names or IDs.

__iter__()[source]¶

Returns an iterator for each node below the current navigation level.

__repr__()[source]¶

Creates a pretty representation of the nodes/folders/groups.

__reversed__()[source]¶

Returns the iterator in reverse order.

__str__()[source]¶

Returns string representation of the nodes/folders/groups.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

allLowerNodes¶

Returns all nodes beneath current level

children¶

Returns a list of the object’s children.

getByID(nid)[source]¶

Gets object with the given ID.

nid: Integer representing node/group/folder id.
getByInd(i)[source]¶

Returns the object at the given index in the list.

i: Integer representing index of node/group/folder.
getByName(val)[source]¶

Gets child object with the given name.

val: String representing name to look for.
hasChildren¶

Indicates if object has children

insert(nid, nname, nparent, nobj, ntype)[source]¶

Inserts a new node into the lists.

nid: node id
nname: node name
nparent: node parent
nobj: node object
ntype: node type
name¶

The name of the current folder in navigation.

parse(xml)[source]¶

Parses the xml data.

xml: String of the xml data
update(waitTime=0)[source]¶

Updates the contents of the class

waitTime: [optional] Amount of seconds to wait before updating

Node¶

class PyISY.Nodes.Node(parent, nid, nval, name, dimmable=True)[source]¶

This class handles ISY nodes.

parent: The ISY object.
nid: The Node ID.
nval: The current Node value.
name: The node name.
[optional] dimmable: Default True. Boolean of whether the node is dimmable.
__str__()[source]¶

Returns a string representation of the node.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

bright()[source]¶

Brightens the node by one step.

dim()[source]¶

Dims the node by one step.

fastoff()[source]¶

Turns the node fast off.

faston()[source]¶

Turns the node fast on.

hasChildren = False¶

Property indicating that there are no more children.

off()[source]¶

Turns the node off.

on(val=None)[source]¶

Turns the node on.

[optional] val: The value brightness value (0-255) to set the node to
update(waitTime=0, hint=None)[source]¶

Update the value of the node from the controller.
